body:
Hello, I wanted to plan a christmas event for Avicus. I have a couple of ideas
  • Secret Santa [PARAGRAPH 1]
  • Give and Take [PARAGRAPH 2]
  • Dragon Escape Event [PARAGRAPH 3]
Secret Santa: 

Basically, whoever enters this will be given someone to get an online gift (Credits, badges etc.) and also you will receive a gift from someone else who has you. Somehow you could leave clues and they could slightly guess from the list of players who may have you. You have to keep it a secret or it ruins the game!

Give and Take:

Whoever enters this event, they will have to have a gift for whoever. We can give and take their gift if they want it. After everyone has done a "I want that" they can see who ends up with what gift. This will be very hard to do :(

Dragon Escape Event:

How this works, is 1 person will be the dragon (AKA Santa) and it will just be a last man standing vsing the Santa (Dragon). Little idea :D

Please leave opinions for an Avicus Christmas Special event
